data.title: Great Service • Great Whiskey • Great Prices
data.text: I came here for a couple quick drinks on a Sunday night.  (That it was a Sunday is important because you almost can't find a drink on a Sunday in Arkansas.)  Gracie's was all but dead and Tiffany was the only one working.  She and I discussed my preference in whiskey, which happens to be Crown, more specifically Crown Special Reserve.  She mentioned that they also had Crown XR for $12.  Initials aside, Crown XR is extremely rare and usually quite pricey.  (A good deal at the liquor store for a 750 mL bottle is $105.)  Anyway, service was great, food looked delicious, prices were outstanding, and the pours were generous.  I will be back!
